noDataDescription: There is no data available at the moment.

alertDialog.description: You won't be able to revert this! This will permanently remove your data from our servers.

login.title: Sign in
login.subtitle: Enter your login information to sign in.
login.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters long
login.passwordInvalid: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one number, and one special character!
login.text1: Connecting with friends and others has never been easier. Eureka brings people closer together.
login.acceptTerms: By clicking Continue, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

register.title: Sign up
register.subtitle: Enter your registration information to sign up.
register.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters long
register.passwordInvalid: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one number, and one special character!
register.acceptTerms: By clicking Continue, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

post.title: Title
post.titleDescription: Your title should be a short description of your post.
post.titleError: Title must be at least 5 and at most 100 characters
post.tagDescription: Choose up to 5 tags to describe what your post is about.
post.tagError: You must choose at least one tag
post.descriptionDescription: Introduce the problem and expand on what your put in the title. Minimum 20 and maximum 2000 characters.
post.descriptionError: Description must be at least 20 and at most 2000 characters
post.createSuccessful: Your post has been created successfully!
post.commentSuccessful: Your comment has been posted successfully!
post.createFailed: An error occurred while creating your post. Please try again later.
post.noOneLiked: No one liked this post yet!
post.noOneDisliked: No one disliked this post yet!
post.savePostFailed: An error occurred while saving the post. Please try again later.
post.unsavePostFailed: An error occurred while unsaving the post. Please try again later.
post.reportPostFailed: An error occurred while reporting the post. Please try again later.
post.actionFailed: An error occurred while processing your action. Please try again later.

myAccount.editProfileDescription: Make changes to your profile here. Click save when you're done.

editProfileForm.name: Name
editProfileForm.aboutMeMax: About me must not exceed 2000 characters
editProfileForm.updateSuccessful: Your profile has been updated successfully!
editProfileForm.updateFailed: An error occurred while updating your profile. Please try again later.
editProfileForm.updateDialogDescription: Make changes to your profile here. Click save when you're done.
editProfileForm.schoolNameMessage: School name is required and must not exceed 255 characters
editProfileForm.companyMessage: Company name is required and must not exceed 255 characters
editProfileForm.companyDescriptionMessage: Description is required and must not exceed 255 characters
editProfileForm.professionMessage: Profession is required and must not exceed 255 characters

friend.addFriendFailed: An error occurred while sending friend request. Please try again later.
friend.acceptFriendFailed: An error occurred while accepting friend request. Please try again later.
friend.rejectFriendFailed: An error occurred while rejecting friend request. Please try again later.
friend.unFriendFailed: An error occurred while unfriending. Please try again later.
friend.haveActedFriendRequest: You have just acted on this request!

community.createAGroupDescription: Create a group to connect with people who share your interests.
community.groupNameMessage: Group name is required and must not exceed 255 characters
community.groupDescriptionMessage: Group description is required and must not exceed 2000 characters
community.createAGroupFailed: An error occurred while creating group. Please try again later.

group.descriptionError: Description must be at least 20 and at most 2000 characters
group.name: Name
group.nameError: Name must be at least 5 and at most 255 characters
group.updateFailed: An error occurred while updating group. Please try again later.
group.approvePostFailed: An error occurred while approving post. Please try again later.
group.rejectPostFailed: An error occurred while rejecting post. Please try again later.
